title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids               For Kids           Be A Junior Ranger  To become a Junior Ranger, download and print, or pick up a copy of the Junior Ranger Activity Booklet at the Visitor Center and start your quest to explore, learn and discover more about Valley Forge. Once you have completed the correct amount of activities, visit the Ranger at the Visitor Center to receive your Junior Ranger Badge! Download the Valley Forge Junior Ranger Activity Book Find a Junior Ranger program at a National Park near you! Did you know that you can be a Junior Ranger even if you are not able to visit a national park? You can with WebRangers! Play more than 50 games and learn about your National Parks.   Â            Scouting at Valley Forge   There are many opportunities for Boy and Girl Scouts in the park.        Family Art in the Park   Make art with a ranger with charcoal drawing and photography.        Junior Ranger Day   Participate in special activities and earn exclusive rewards.
